BSG1-098.title: Apollo
BSG1-098.subtitle: Ace Pilot
BSG1-098.abilityText: Scramble (This personnel can defend as though it were a ship.)
BSG1-098.flavorText: "...this is my job and don't think for one moment that I won't get it done." —Capt. Adama

BSG1-099.title: Apollo
BSG1-099.subtitle: Commander Air Group
BSG1-099.abilityText: All other Pilots you control get +1 power.
BSG1-099.flavorText: "You know the drill, people. Scatter formation, keep 'em off the civvies, and don't stray beyond the recovery line." —Capt. Adama

BSG1-100.title: Apollo
BSG1-100.subtitle: Political Liaison
BSG1-100.abilityText: All other Officers you control gain the Politician trait.
BSG1-100.flavorText: "As leaders, don't we have an obligation to question our actions, to make sure the decisions that we make are the right decisions?" —Capt. Adama

BSG1-101.title: Billy Keikeya
BSG1-101.subtitle: Presidential Aide
BSG1-101.abilityText: When this card enters play as a personnel, gain 1 influence.
BSG1-101.flavorText: "If this could've waited a few more months until the presidential election, we could've hand-picked a candidate to run on our ticket." —Billy Keikeya

BSG1-102.title: Billy Keikeya
BSG1-102.subtitle: Press Secretary
BSG1-102.abilityText: While defending, this personnel gets +2 power.
BSG1-102.flavorText: "And thank you for making my first official press conference a relatively bloodless affair." —Billy Keikeya

BSG1-103.title: Boomer
BSG1-103.subtitle: Hell Of A Pilot
BSG1-103.abilityText: Scramble (This personnel can defend as though it were a ship.)
BSG1-103.flavorText: "Don't ask questions, just follow your pilot." —Lt. Valerii

BSG1-104.title: Boomer
BSG1-104.subtitle: Raptor Pilot
BSG1-104.abilityText: When this card enters play as a personnel, draw a card.
BSG1-104.flavorText: "Plans B, C, D, and E are the same as plan A: get off the planet and get back to the ship." —Lt. Valerii

BSG1-106.subtitle: Centurion Ambusher
BSG1-106.abilityText: Commit: Target Cylon threat gets +2 power.
BSG1-106.cylonThreatText: Each player sacrifices a reserve ship.

BSG1-107.subtitle: Centurion Assassin
BSG1-107.cylonThreatText: Each player puts the top card of his or her deck into his or her discard pile.

BSG1-108.subtitle: Centurion Slayer
BSG1-108.abilityText: Sniper (Each time this personnel challenges, you may choose the defender.)

BSG1-109.title: Crashdown
BSG1-109.subtitle: Alex Quartararo
BSG1-109.flavorText: "Beginning dradis two sweep. So I say we give this lovely little rock of nothing a name. I'm thinking...Kimiko." —Lt. Quartararo

BSG1-110.title: Crashdown
BSG1-110.subtitle: Expert ECO
BSG1-110.abilityText: Commit: Choose target other unit. If that unit is challenging, it gets +2 power.

BSG1-111.title: Crashdown
BSG1-111.subtitle: Sensor Operator
BSG1-111.abilityText: Commit and exhaust: Put target card from your discard pile into your hand.
BSG1-111.flavorText: "Crashdown/Galactica. We've completed our search. Positive water findings. Repeat: We found water!" —Lt. Quartararo

BSG1-112.subtitle: Cylon Centurion
BSG1-112.abilityText: While challenging, this personnel gets +2 power.
BSG1-112.cylonThreatText: Each player sacrifices a reserve personnel.
BSG1-112.flavorText: The Cylons were created by man. They rebelled. They evolved.

BSG1-113.title: D'Anna Biers
BSG1-113.subtitle: Fleet News Service
BSG1-113.abilityText: Commit: Choose target other unit. If that unit is challenging, it gets +2 power.
BSG1-113.cylonThreatText: Each player exhausts a personnel he or she controls.
BSG1-113.flavorText: "Is this a social call or are we on the verge of another coup?" —D'Anna Biers

BSG1-114.title: D'Anna Biers
BSG1-114.subtitle: Reporter
BSG1-114.abilityText: This personnel cannot challenge. (This personnel can defend.)
BSG1-114.cylonThreatText: Each player commits a personnel he or she controls.
BSG1-114.flavorText: "I take it I'm here because you're unhappy with my report on the Gideon Massacre." —D'Anna Biers

BSG1-115.title: Dee
BSG1-115.subtitle: Dradis Operator
BSG1-115.abilityText: During the Cylon phase, this personnel gets +2 power.
BSG1-115.flavorText: "Contact! Dradis contact! Incoming, bearing zero-six-zero, carom three-zero-eight." —PO 2nd Class Dualla

BSG1-116.title: Dee
BSG1-116.subtitle: Security Advisor
BSG1-116.abilityText: Commit: Target other personnel gets +2 power.
BSG1-116.flavorText: "How about Dee? Petty Officer 2nd Class Dualla. She works in CIC..." —Billy Keikeya

BSG1-117.title: Dr. Baltar
BSG1-117.subtitle: Award Winner
BSG1-117.abilityText: Commit and exhaust: Put target personnel card from your discard pile into your hand.
BSG1-117.flavorText: World-famous winner of three Magnate Prizes, and best known for his controversial views on computer technology.

BSG1-118.title: Dr. Baltar
BSG1-118.subtitle: Science Advisor
BSG1-118.flavorText: "I am not on anybody's side." —Dr. Baltar

BSG1-119.title: Dr. Baltar
BSG1-119.subtitle: Vice President
BSG1-119.abilityText: Commit: Move target mission to its owner's reserve area. Commit: Ready target mission.
BSG1-119.flavorText: "Mr. Vice President if you please, Lieutenant. Some decorum is called for after all. Not a pirate ship you're running here, is it?" —Dr. Baltar

BSG1-120.title: Galen Tyrol
BSG1-120.subtitle: CPO
BSG1-120.flavorText: "Show's over. We got work to do." —CPO Tyrol

BSG1-121.title: Galen Tyrol
BSG1-121.subtitle: The Chief
BSG1-121.abilityText: Each time a ship you control enters play, you may commit this personnel to ready that ship.
BSG1-121.flavorText: "Here's what you gotta do: First, you're gonna have to remove my size 12 shoe from your ass." —CPO Tyrol

BSG1-122.title: Helo
BSG1-122.subtitle: Flight Officer
BSG1-122.flavorText: "Sharon, we've made it this far. We're gonna make it all the way." —Lt. Agathon

BSG1-123.title: Helo
BSG1-123.subtitle: Karl Agathon
BSG1-123.flavorText: "Sleep a little longer. Who knows when we'll find clean sheets again? I'll go topside and make breakfast." —Lt. Agathon

BSG1-124.title: Helo
BSG1-124.subtitle: Raptor ECO
BSG1-124.abilityText: This personnel gets +3 power while challenging a Cylon personnel.
BSG1-124.flavorText: "Never send a pilot to do an ECO's job." —Lt. Agathon

BSG1-125.title: Laura Roslin
BSG1-125.subtitle: Colonial President
BSG1-125.flavorText: "You need to understand that my responsibility as president is, first and foremost, to preserve and protect the people of this fleet." —President Roslin

BSG1-126.title: Laura Roslin
BSG1-126.subtitle: Leader Of Prophecy
BSG1-126.abilityText: Each time you reveal a card for its mystic value, that card gets +1 to its mystic value.
BSG1-126.flavorText: "She also wrote that the leader suffered a wasting disease and would not live to enter the new land. But you're not dying. Are you?" —Elosha

BSG1-127.title: Laura Roslin
BSG1-127.subtitle: Madame President
BSG1-127.flavorText: "I am committed to providing a future for our people." —President Roslin

BSG1-128.title: Mr. Gaeta
BSG1-128.subtitle: Senior Officer Of The Watch
BSG1-128.abilityText: Each time this personnel challenges, you may ready it when that challenge ends. Play this ability only once each turn.
BSG1-128.flavorText: "Gun captains report weapons manned and ready." —Lt. Gaeta

BSG1-129.title: Mr. Gaeta
BSG1-129.subtitle: Tactical Officer
BSG1-129.abilityText: Commit: Choose target other unit. If that unit is challenging a Cylon threat, it gets +2 power.
BSG1-129.flavorText: "Dradis contact—strike that, multiple contacts. It's the Cylons." —Lt. Gaeta

BSG1-130.title: Number Six
BSG1-130.subtitle: Agent Provocateur
BSG1-130.abilityText: Vision (This personnel can't challenge or defend.) Commit and sacrifice: Take an extra two actions after this one.
BSG1-130.cylonThreatText: Each player exhausts his or her base.
BSG1-130.flavorText: "Have you always been able to multitask like this?" —Number Six

BSG1-131.title: Number Six
BSG1-131.subtitle: Caprican Operative
BSG1-131.abilityText: Commit and exhaust: Ready target other Cylon personnel.
BSG1-131.cylonThreatText: Each player exhausts an asset he or she controls.
BSG1-131.flavorText: "I hope you're more convincing than that with him." —Number Six

BSG1-132.title: Number Six
BSG1-132.subtitle: Secret Companion
BSG1-132.abilityText: Vision (This personnel can't challenge or defend.) Commit: Exhaust target other personnel.
BSG1-132.cylonThreatText: Each player commits a personnel he or she controls.
BSG1-132.flavorText: "Parties full of young women drawn to men of power..." —Number Six

BSG1-133.title: Saul Tigh
BSG1-133.subtitle: Colonial Colonel
BSG1-133.flavorText: "Well, they found us. It was only a matter of time." —Col. Tigh

BSG1-134.title: Saul Tigh
BSG1-134.subtitle: Executive Officer
BSG1-134.abilityText: Each time you are challenged, you may ready this personnel. When that challenge ends, commit and exhaust this personnel.
BSG1-134.flavorText: "With all due respect, Madame President, this is damned lunacy." —Col. Tigh

BSG1-135.title: Shelley Godfrey
BSG1-135.subtitle: Systems Analyst
BSG1-135.abilityText: Commit: Target opponent reveals his or her hand. You choose a personnel card in it. Put that card on top of its owner's deck.
BSG1-135.cylonThreatText: Each player puts one card from the top of his or her deck into his or her discard pile.
BSG1-135.flavorText: "Doctor Amarak told me he had evidence that Doctor Baltar was involved in the sneak attack." —Shelley Godfrey

BSG1-136.title: Starbuck
BSG1-136.subtitle: Hotshot Pilot
BSG1-136.abilityText: This personnel gets +1 power for each other Pilot you control.
BSG1-136.flavorText: "Pilots call me 'Starbuck'; you may refer to me as 'God.'" —Lt. Thrace

BSG1-137.title: Starbuck
BSG1-137.subtitle: Risk Taker
BSG1-137.abilityText: Each time you reveal a mystic value, you may commit this personnel. If you do, ignore that mystic value and reveal another instead.
BSG1-137.flavorText: "No guts, no glory, Doctor. See your five. Raise twenty." —Lt. Thrace

BSG1-138.title: Starbuck
BSG1-138.subtitle: Sharpshooter
BSG1-138.abilityText: Sniper (Each time this personnel challenges, you may choose the defender.)
BSG1-138.flavorText: "Constellation. Two. Armed. Ten o'clock. Bottom." —Lt. Thrace

BSG1-139.title: Tom Zarek
BSG1-139.subtitle: Political Prisoner
BSG1-139.abilityText: When this card enters play as a personnel, defeat target personnel.
BSG1-139.flavorText: "Always better when the oppressed don't fight back, isn't it? Only the government gets to use force." —Tom Zarek

BSG1-140.title: Tom Zarek
BSG1-140.subtitle: Sagittaron Representative
BSG1-140.abilityText: Manipulate (Each time this personnel challenges and there is no defender, you may gain influence equal to its power instead.)

BSG1-141.title: William Adama
BSG1-141.subtitle: Colonial Commander
BSG1-141.abilityText: Manipulate (Each time this personnel challenges and there is no defender, you may gain influence equal to its power instead of your opponent losing influence.)
BSG1-141.flavorText: "You did your job to the best of your ability. That's all I can ask." —Cmdr. Adama

BSG1-142.title: William Adama
BSG1-142.subtitle: Patriotic Soldier
BSG1-142.abilityText: Commit: Choose target other unit. If that unit is challenging, it gets +2 power.
BSG1-142.flavorText: "I've given all of us a fighting chance to survive." —Cmdr. Adama

BSG1-143.title: William Adama
BSG1-143.subtitle: The Old Man
BSG1-143.abilityText: While you control another alert personnel, this personnel gets +2 power.
BSG1-143.flavorText: "...gotta make the Old Man look good." —Col. Tigh "I always look good." —Cmdr. Adama

BSG2-113.title: Helo
BSG2-113.subtitle: Prisoner Of The Cylons
BSG2-113.abilityText: When this personnel is defeated, gain 2 influence.
BSG2-113.flavorText: "Agathon, Karl C. Lieutenant, junior grade, Colonial fleet." —Lt. Karl "Helo" Agathon

BSG2-122.title: Number Six
BSG2-122.subtitle: Temptress
BSG2-122.abilityText: Manipulate (Each time this unit challenges and there is no defender, you can gain influence equal to its power instead of your opponent losing influence.)
BSG2-122.cylonThreatText: Each player commits and exhausts a personnel he or she controls.

BSG2-083.title: Anders
BSG2-083.subtitle: Caprican Buccaneer
BSG2-083.flavorText: "There are some things one cannot live without." —Samuel Anders

BSG2-084.title: Anders
BSG2-084.subtitle: Resistance Leader
BSG2-084.abilityText: All other Civilian units you control get +1 power.
BSG2-084.flavorText: "I want to blow these Cylons away before they ever knew what hit 'em." —Samuel Anders

BSG2-085.title: Apollo
BSG2-085.subtitle: Distant Son
BSG2-085.abilityText: Commit: Target other personnel gains Strafe. (This unit can challenge as a personnel or a ship. Make this choice before the defender is chosen.)
BSG2-085.flavorText: "I'm glad to hear that, sir; will that be all?" —Capt. Lee "Apollo" Adama

BSG2-086.title: Apollo
BSG2-086.subtitle: Man Of The Hour
BSG2-086.abilityText: Commit: Put target Cylon threat into its owner's discard pile. The challenge ends. Commit the challenger.

BSG2-087.title: Boomer
BSG2-087.subtitle: Cylon Conspirator
BSG2-087.abilityText: This personnel counts as 1 Civilian unit and 1 Cylon unit for the purpose of resolving a mission.
BSG2-087.cylonThreatText: Each player exhausts a personnel he or she controls.

BSG2-088.title: Boomer
BSG2-088.subtitle: Human-Lover
BSG2-088.abilityText: While you control an alert Helo, this personnel gets +1 power.
BSG2-088.cylonThreatText: Each player commits a Cylon unit he or she controls.
BSG2-088.flavorText: "Because I love you, Helo. No other reason." —Lt. Sharon "Boomer" Valerii

BSG2-089.title: Boomer
BSG2-089.subtitle: Savior
BSG2-089.abilityText: Commit and exhaust: Search your deck for a personnel card, reveal it, and then put it into your hand.
BSG2-089.flavorText: "All right, the kids go . . . and we can take three more people." —Lt. Sharon "Boomer" Valerii

BSG2-091.subtitle: Centurion Guardian
BSG2-091.abilityText: Vulnerable (Personnel and ships can defend against this unit.)
BSG2-091.cylonThreatText: Each player exhausts an asset that he or she controls that has no supply cards.

BSG2-092.subtitle: Centurion Harasser
BSG2-092.cylonThreatText: Each player chooses target opponent. That opponent sacrifices a personnel he or she controls.

BSG2-093.subtitle: Centurion Hunter
BSG2-093.abilityText: Commit target other Cylon personnel you control: This personnel gets +2 power. Play this ability only once each turn.

BSG2-094.subtitle: Centurion Tracker
BSG2-094.abilityText: Each time this personnel challenges, sacrifice it when that challenge ends.
BSG2-094.cylonThreatText: Each player exhausts a personnel he or she controls.

BSG2-096.title: Doral
BSG2-096.subtitle: Public Relations
BSG2-096.abilityText: Manipulate (Each time this unit challenges and there is no defender, you can gain influence equal to its power instead of your opponent losing influence.)
BSG2-096.flavorText: "My name is Aaron Doral; I'm from Public Relations." —Aaron Doral

BSG2-097.title: Doral
BSG2-097.subtitle: Tour Guide
BSG2-097.flavorText: "There's a saying in the Colonial fleet that you can jam every sensor but the human brain." —Aaron Doral

BSG2-098.title: Dr. Baltar
BSG2-098.subtitle: Defense Contractor
BSG2-098.abilityText: Commit target other personnel you control: This personnel gets +1 power.
BSG2-098.flavorText: "I did not plant a bomb in the defense mainframe, and I did not conspire with the Cylons." —Dr. Gaius Baltar

BSG2-099.title: Dr. Baltar
BSG2-099.subtitle: Refugee
BSG2-099.flavorText: "Hey, aren't you Gaius Baltar?" —Lt. Karl "Helo" Agathon

BSG2-100.title: Dr. Baltar
BSG2-100.subtitle: Survivor
BSG2-100.abilityText: Sacrifice target alert personnel: This personnel gets +3 power. Play this ability only once each turn.
BSG2-100.flavorText: "I have a highly developed sense of survival." —Dr. Gaius Baltar

BSG2-101.title: Dr. Cottle
BSG2-101.subtitle: Bearer Of Bad News
BSG2-101.flavorText: "It's too damned late to operate; the cancer's too advanced." —Dr. Cottle

BSG2-102.title: Dr. Cottle
BSG2-102.subtitle: Doc
BSG2-102.abilityText: Commit and exhaust: Put target personnel from your discard pile into your hand.
BSG2-102.flavorText: "This is the sick bay of a battlestar. I patch up wounded and send 'em home." —Dr. Cottle

BSG2-103.title: Dr. Cottle
BSG2-103.subtitle: Military Surgeon
BSG2-103.abilityText: Commit this personnel during a challenge: The unit that loses the challenge is exhausted instead of defeated.
BSG2-103.flavorText:
"You have a ship's doctor aboard Galactica?" —President Laura Roslin
"Major Cottle." —Cmdr. William Adama

BSG2-104.title: Ellen Tigh
BSG2-104.subtitle: High Society Player
BSG2-104.abilityText: Manipulate (Each time this unit challenges and there is no defender, you can gain influence equal to its power instead of your opponent losing influence.)
BSG2-104.flavorText: "You're clearly a well-connected, well-informed woman." —Tom Zarek

BSG2-105.title: Ellen Tigh
BSG2-105.subtitle: Power Behind The XO
BSG2-105.flavorText: "Well, if being the XO's wife doesn't have some privileges, what's the point?" —Ellen Tigh

BSG2-107.title: Elosha
BSG2-107.subtitle: Guide To The Prophet
BSG2-107.abilityText: Commit: Reveal the top card of your deck. Target other unit gets +X power, where X is the revealed card's mystic value.
BSG2-107.flavorText: "The scriptures tell us that Kobol points the way to Earth." —Elosha

BSG2-108.title: Elosha
BSG2-108.subtitle: Priestess
BSG2-108.abilityText: Commit during a challenge: When you reveal a mystic value this challenge, reveal an additional mystic value. Your mystic value is the sum of these two mystic values.

BSG2-109.title: Galen Tyrol
BSG2-109.subtitle: Crew Chief
BSG2-109.abilityText: When this card enters play as a personnel, ready a ship you control.
BSG2-109.flavorText: "Morning, sir. Chief Tyrol—I'll be your crew chief while you're aboard." —Chief Galen Tyrol

BSG2-110.title: Hadrian
BSG2-110.subtitle: Head Of Tribunal
BSG2-110.abilityText: Commit: Commit and exhaust target personnel with power 2 or less.
BSG2-110.flavorText: "A tribunal has been formed to look into the Cylon penetration of our defenses." —Sgt. Hadrian

BSG2-111.title: Hadrian
BSG2-111.subtitle: Investigator
BSG2-111.abilityText: Commit: Commit and exhaust target Enlisted or Cylon personnel.
BSG2-111.flavorText: "I'll need statements from you and the rest of your deck gang." —Sgt. Hadrian

BSG2-112.title: Hadrian
BSG2-112.subtitle: Master-At-Arms
BSG2-112.flavorText: "As master-at-arms, she'll be investigating this incident." —Cmdr. William Adama

BSG2-114.title: Helo
BSG2-114.subtitle: Protector
BSG2-114.abilityText: Commit: Target other defending personnel gets +2 power.
BSG2-114.flavorText: "I'm not gonna let you kill her!" —Lt. Karl "Helo" Agathon

BSG2-115.title: Helo
BSG2-115.subtitle: Toaster-Lover
BSG2-115.abilityText: Each time this personnel challenges while you control an alert Boomer, you can ready this personnel when the challenge ends. Play this ability only once each turn.

BSG2-116.title: Laura Roslin
BSG2-116.subtitle: Instigator
BSG2-116.flavorText: "If you bring me the Arrow, I will show us the way." —President Laura Roslin

BSG2-117.title: Laura Roslin
BSG2-117.subtitle: Secretary of Education
BSG2-117.abilityText: Commit: Target other personnel gets +2 power.
BSG2-117.flavorText: "We're in the middle of a war, and you want to take orders from a school teacher?" —Cmdr. William Adama

BSG2-118.title: Leoben
BSG2-118.subtitle: Snake in the Grass
BSG2-118.abilityText: Commit: Target personnel gains the Cylon trait.

BSG2-119.title: Mr. Gaeta
BSG2-119.subtitle: Brilliant Officer
BSG2-119.abilityText: Commit: Cylon threat of target card gets -1 until the end of the turn.

BSG2-120.title: Number Six
BSG2-120.subtitle: Huntress
BSG2-120.abilityText: Sniper (Each time this unit challenges, you can choose the defender.)
BSG2-120.cylonThreatText: Each player exhausts target resource stack he or she controls.

BSG2-121.title: Number Six
BSG2-121.subtitle: Seductress
BSG2-121.abilityText:
Vision (This unit can't challenge or defend.)
Each time a personnel challenges and there is no defender, you can commit this personnel. If you do, the challenger gets +2 power.

BSG2-123.title: Saul Tigh
BSG2-123.subtitle: Disciplinarian
BSG2-123.abilityText: Commit and exhaust: Commit and exhaust target personnel.
BSG2-123.flavorText: "Do your job or get back to the brig." —Col. Saul Tigh

BSG2-124.title: Simon
BSG2-124.subtitle: Caring Doctor
BSG2-124.cylonThreatText: Each player exhausts a personnel he or she controls.
BSG2-124.flavorText: "I'm Simon. Can you tell me your name?" —Simon

BSG2-125.title: Simon
BSG2-125.subtitle: Cylon Scientist
BSG2-125.abilityText: Manipulate (Each time this unit challenges and there is no defender, you can gain influence equal to its power instead of your opponent losing influence.)
BSG2-125.cylonThreatText: Each player puts the top card of his or her deck into his or her discard pile.

BSG2-126.title: Starbuck
BSG2-126.subtitle: Maverick
BSG2-126.abilityText: Commit and exhaust: Put target alert personnel into its owner's hand.
BSG2-126.flavorText: "You should go. I'm getting the urge to hit another superior asshole." —Lt. Kara "Starbuck" Thrace

BSG2-127.title: Starbuck
BSG2-127.subtitle: Resistance Fighter
BSG2-127.abilityText: Commit and exhaust: Exhaust target resource stack.
BSG2-127.flavorText: "We could use some professional advice." —Samuel Anders

BSG2-128.title: Starbuck
BSG2-128.subtitle: Uncooperative Patient
BSG2-128.abilityText: Commit and exhaust: Defeat target Cylon personnel.
BSG2-128.flavorText: "I never told you my callsign was 'Starbuck.'" —Lt. Kara "Starbuck" Thrace

BSG2-129.title: William Adama
BSG2-129.subtitle: Husker
BSG2-129.abilityText: Scramble (This unit can defend as a personnel or a ship.)
BSG2-129.flavorText: "He ever tell you what he did for his thousandth landing?" —Lt. Kara "Starbuck" Thrace

BSG2-130.title: William Adama
BSG2-130.subtitle: Tactician
BSG2-130.abilityText: Commit: Target other personnel gains Sniper. (Each time this unit challenges, you can choose the defender.)
